page.title: 07SUPERNATURAL EVENTS
page.content:
SUPERNATURAL EVENTS AT THE BAY HOTEL.
THE FIRST SIGHTINGS OF GHOSTS WERE IN 1980,IN ROOMS SIX AND EIGHT.THE EVENTS OCCURRED OVER A PERIOD OF SIX TO EIGHT MONTHS. AT THE HEIGHT OF THE TROUBLE, THE HOUSE OPPOSITE HAD PROBLEMS AS WELL. MOST OF THE SIGHTINGS WERE ON A SUNDAY EVENING. GHOST HUNTERS WERE CALLED IN.THEIR IDEA WAS THAT SOMEONE HAD A "KEY" TO A GATE AND UNKNOWINGLY HAD UNLOCKED IT, CAUSING ALL THE {"INTERFERENCES" ONE OF THE REASONS IS THAT THE BAY HOTEL MAYBE BUILT ON A SACRIFICIAL BURIAL GROUND. ON ONE OCCASION MRS RATTON, THE OWNER WAS TALKING TO A CHEF, WHEN THE BAR WENT QUIET. THEY LOOKED IN AND SAW EVERYBODY STANDING STILL. NOBODY WAS MOVING, NOT EVEN THE DOG.
